phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Asta and the other Black Bulls headed to the beach town of Raquey
in order to go to the Underwater Temple that lay deep beneath the water there.
Asta and the other Black Bulls received an order
to retrieve the magic stone in the temple
so they can stop the Eye of the Midnight Sun,
who want to separate from the Clover Kingdom and create their own country.
Why are you all playing around?!
All right, gather round, you idiots.
Apparently the Underwater Temple really is at the bottom of the ocean.
But the mana kicks up the ocean currents so much that,
ordinarily, even a first-class mage cannot get near it.
But on the night of the full moon,
We might be able to get in then.
Like the name suggests, the Underwater Temple is on the ocean floor.
We cannot just walk to it.
Take us there with your water magic.
B-But I would need incredible magic control in order to do that.
The next full moon is a week away.
Learn to control it by then.
Oh, I just thought I would let in some fresh air.
What is your foot doing there?
Hey, now, how did that get there?
You were planning to forget your work and go out to play, were not you?
Now, why would I go out to play?
I just wanted to go observe some magic
You do not have time for that!
Please do your work for once!
Hurry up and shut that window!
We have not even resolved the incident with the Eye of the Midnight Sun yet.
Do not be so angry, Marx.
You are going to die young.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun, eh?
I hope Yami and the others are doing well.
I just hope they are not fooling around.
I wish I could have gone to the Underwater Temple.
I feel sick from drinking too much...
I will be the sun that will make you shine.
How dare you eat my pudding?!
I wrote my name on it!
Other people's food always tastes better!
We are not here to play!
I wonder if she is from Raquey.
It is so beautiful and ethereal...
Whoa, is she a water spirit?
She is not like what I would imagined.
Well, now that you have heard me, there is no way around it.
Who are you calling Stupidsta the meathead?!
Ah, so Noelle and Stupidsta the meathead.
That is totally a nickname, and she is making fun of me!
So what were you doing out here, Kahono?
Well, yeah, I could see that.
I love singing at this spot.
I want to be a singing, dancing, magic-using...
They are all the rage in the Common Realm and Noble Realm right now!
Idols are popular people who can sing, dance, and use magic!
I am going to become a famous idol and get super rich!
What is so great about money, anyway?
If you do have it, it is just in the way.
It is not in the way!
You have never had to worry about not having money, so you would not understand.
You cannot eat tatoes without any money!
If you do not have any tatoes, why do not you just eat steak?
I totally understand what Stupidsta's saying!
Seriously, who are you calling Stupidsta?!
I told you, it is Asta!
Do you ache when you move?
You will feel better in a sec.
I do not hurt anywhere anymore!
My muscles are not fatigued anymore!
I have never seen song recovery magic before.
Okay, that will be 100 yuls per session.
Just let me know when you want me to sing for you again.
I can buy at least ten tatoes with that!
A girl my age... who is a friend?
W-Well, if you insist, I guess I do not mind.
I am willing to be your friend.
I am so happy, I could not help myself.
So you are both Magic Knights.
It is to be expected for me.
So, what brings you to Raquey?
We are on an important mission.
We are actually trying to get to the Underwater Tem
Sorry, but this mission's a secret.
So, what were you two up to at this hour?
The moonlight is so romantic, is not it?
The sound of the splashing waves also heightens the mood and...
I told you, that is not it!
I cannot give you the details,
but I need to learn how to control my magic within the week before the next full moon.
So you want to control your magic...
Show me your magic real quick.
Now that we are friends, I have some advice for you.
I think you are trying to hold in
your mana too much when you try to control your magic.
I listen to the sound of the waves to calm myself
so I can use my magic exactly how I want to.
It might just be me, but I think that true concentration comes from a calm heart.
I also feel like my best swings happen when I am not thinking about anything at all!
You do not even use magic, and you are never thinking about anything, anyway.
What is the kindest memory you have that brings you the most peace?
To think that the last thing the one they called the Steel Princess
gave this world would be someone as useless as you.
I will never accept a failure like you as family.
The House of Silva does not need someone like you.
Why did Mother have to die to give birth to someone like you?
I will try practicing a bit more.
Let me know if you get tired.
It will only be a hundred...
No, it will only be a thousand yuls, since you are a royal.
You are shining under my sun!
Are they having some kind of contest?
You can just pay me later.
Will not someone come get me?
You have almost got it, Noelle!
I still cannot control it at all.
At this rate, the mission will be...
I just got a great idea!
Stop thinking, and set all of your magic free!
That thing from the first time you lost control would probably go underwater the best.
That you were holding your magic back?
If that is the case, maybe it will work if you just let everything loose.
If that happens, I will use my sword to save you!
So do not worry and just go!
Do not blame me if something happens!
This is not going to work at all!
How am I supposed to relax in this situation?
I guess I really cannot do it.
I do not have any... kind memories at all...
You are always talking big, so what the hell is that?
And you call yourself a Black Bull?!
All that awesome magic is going to waste.
Hurry and learn how to control it so you can fight me!
Even if you mess up, you will not die or anything!
Hurry up and finish so you can eat this!
Even if you fall, I will catch you gently!
If you fall, I am kicking you back up there, so make this work.
Just get it done, damn it!
So you are Nozel's little sister.
Your big bro mentioned that you are some loser who cannot even control her magic.
And that you would not be able to pass the Entrance Exam even if you tried.
I have never seen a royal fail before.
Well, if you feel like fighting, why do not you come join my team?
The absolute worst Magic Knights squad, the Black Bulls.
We are all nothing but losers.
Meaning we are perfect for you.
I was with my family for years, but I did not have a single pleasant memory of them.
It is only been a few months since I joined the Black Bulls, but...
They all acknowledged me and gave me a mission.
Water Creation Magic: Sea Dragon's Cradle!
This feels great after being in the sun all day!
Could you not touch me so casually?!
Well, guess we should get going
You have got some great friends!
They are the ones who should be cheering for you in the end!
Well, I will be waiting for you, Noelle!
It will just be ten billion yuls!
What in the world are you doing?
I am sure you will be invincible once you can control your magic, Noelle.
Black Clover, Page 42: The Underwater Temple.
